title: First Hero-Harley co-developed bike likely to hit market in two years
description: A bike jointly developed by Hero MotoCorp and Harley-Davidson could hit the market in the next two years, according to Hero MotoCorp CFO Niranjan Gupta. The launch is part of Hero MotoCorp's plans to strengthen its position in the premium segment. The company is building a strong pipeline of premium products and will launch models in this segment every year
